data.comment: The match has started.
The match has started.
Throw-in Metz.
Throw-in for Nimes close to the penalty box.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Nimes throw-in in Metz's half.
Nimes pushes forward through Nolan Roux, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Metz Nimes drive forward through Nolan Roux. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Sidy Sarr of Nimes gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ruddy Buquet awards Metz a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nimes in Metz.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
Metz move into a 1-0 lead through a Opa Nguette header.
Fabien Centtonze instrumental with a fine assist.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Important block from the Nimes defence as Habib Maiga fires in a strike for Metz.
Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Nimes have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Nimes at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Nimes to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Metz.
Nimes push upfield but Ruddy Buquet quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ruddy Buquet awards the away team a throw-in.
Nimes needs to be cautious. Metz have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
Ruddy Buquet awards the away team a throw-in.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Can Metz capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nimes's half?
Metz drives forward and Fabien Centtonze gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Moussa Kone for Nimes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Metz have a goal kick.
Ibrahima Niane of Metz smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Ruddy Buquet signals a throw-in for Nimes, close to Metz's area.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Loick Landre.
Loick Landre has recovered and rejoins the match in Metz.
Nimes needs to be cautious. Metz have an attacking throw-in.
Metz are pushing forward but Farid Boulaya's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
Attention is being given to Nimesâ€™s Paul Bernardoni and play has been suspended briefly.
Nimes's Paul Bernardoni is back in action after a slight knock.
Can Nimes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Metz's half?
Goal kick for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In Metz Metz attack through Opa Nguette. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Throw-in for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Goal kick for Nimes at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Metz's Kevin N`Doram misses with an attempt on goal.
Ruddy Buquet awards Nimes a goal kick.
Metz have a dangerous throw-in.
Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Metz.
Throw-in for Metz in the half of Nimes.
Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
Throw-in for Metz close to the penalty box.
Metz are in shooting range from this free kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
Metz's Vincent Pajot breaks free at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Nimes have a goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Pablo Martinez for Nimes who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nimes's Pablo Martinez looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Nimes throw-in in Metz's half.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Free kick for Nimes in the half of Metz.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Ruddy Buquet signals a throw-in for Nimes, close to Metz's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Nimes in Metz.
Zinedine Ferhat gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nimes.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Metz.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Corner awarded to Metz.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
Moussa Kone for Nimes drives towards goal at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Lucas Deaux grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Great play from Yassine Benrahou to set up the goal.
Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ruddy Buquet waits before resuming play because Lucas Deaux for Nimes is still down.
Lucas Deaux is back on his feet again.
Corner awarded to Nimes.
Lucas Deaux (Nimes) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Nimes's Moussa Kone gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Nimes have a dangerous throw-in.
Metz needs to be cautious. Nimes have an attacking throw-in.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Metz capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Metz's Farid Boulaya is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Farid Boulaya (Metz) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ruddy Buquet awards Nimes a goal kick.
Metz to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
The match at Stade Saint Symphorien has been interrupted briefly for a check on Paul Bernardoni, who is down injured.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Metz to check on Ibrahima Niane, who is grimacing with pain.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Paul Bernardoni for Nimes is back on the field again.
Ibrahima Niane returns to the field for Metz after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Metz.
Nimes are coming forward and Nolan Roux gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Metz have a goal kick.
Romain Philippoteaux is on a sub for Moussa Kone for Nimes.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Nimes at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Nimes.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Metz throw-in in Nimes's half.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Metz to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Metz's Vincent Pajot gets in a shot on goal at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
At Stade Saint Symphorien, Metz are penalized for being offside.
Can Nimes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Metz's half?
Thierry Ambrose is replacing Opa Nguette for the home team.
Nimes pushes forward through Yassine Benrahou, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick Metz.
In Metz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ruddy Buquet awards Metz a goal kick.
The away team replace Yassine Benrahou with Theo Valls.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Goal! John Boye heads Metz into a 2-1 lead.
Habib Maiga with an assist there.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Metz's half?
Metz make their second substitution with Noss replacing Farid Boulaya.
Theo Valls (Nimes) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Metz, Sidy Sarr of Nimes is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Nimes.
Metz make their third substitution with Victorien Angban replacing Habib Maiga.
Metz drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Metz close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Metz in Metz.
Nimes have a goal kick.
Free kick Nimes.
The away team replace Gaetan Paquiez with Kevin Denkey.
Ruddy Buquet signals a throw-in for Nimes, close to Metz's area.
In Metz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Noss (Metz) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Metz, Thierry Ambrose (Metz) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
Nimes's Nolan Roux is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Metz to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Metz needs to be cautious. Nimes have an attacking throw-in.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
That's full-time at Stade Saint Symphorien. The final score is 2-1.
